meanings.sent1: She felt cold and jacketless in the chilly wind.
meanings.sent2: The jacketless man shivered as he walked down the street.
meanings.sent3: The jacketless squirrel looked envious of the cozy ones with jackets.
meanings.sent4: The jacketless sky seemed to embrace the whole world in its vastness.
meanings.sent5: Her jacketless state made her wish she had brought a coat.

meanings.sent1: The jacketless child hugged herself to keep warm.
meanings.sent2: He realized he was jacketless just as the rain started pouring.
meanings.sent3: The jacketless penguin waddled awkwardly in the snow.
meanings.sent4: The jacketless flower wilted under the harsh sun's rays.
meanings.sent5: Being jacketless on a rainy day was not a pleasant experience.
